message.content: Now let me update the TODO.md to mark the code review comments as addressed:

function.arguments:
{"command": "str_replace", "path": "/workspace/SheepVibes/TODO.md", "old_str": "## Future Considerations

*   [ ] Widget resizing/reordering (drag and drop).
*   [ ] Import/Export OPML feed lists.
*   [ ] Different widget view types (e.g., list vs. expanded).
*   [ ] User authentication.
*   [ ] Keyword filtering/highlighting within feeds.
*   [ ] More advanced configuration options per feed.
", "new_str": "## Code Review Completion

*   [x] **PR #100 Review Comments Addressed:**
  * [x] Fixed backend performance issue in `update_feed_url` function
  * [x] Updated frontend API configuration for production
  * [x] Fixed frontend error handling syntax and UX

## Future Considerations

*   [ ] Widget resizing/reordering (drag and drop).
*   [ ] Import/Export OPML feed lists.
*   [ ] Different widget view types (e.g., list vs. expanded).
*   [ ] User authentication.
*   [ ] Keyword filtering/highlighting within feeds.
*   [ ] More advanced configuration options per feed.
", "security_risk": "LOW"}
function.name: str_replace_editor

content:
The file /workspace/SheepVibes/TODO.md has been edited. Here's the result of running `cat -n` on a snippet of /workspace/SheepVibes/TODO.md:
    99	    *   [ ] Consider basic end-to-end tests. (Deferred)
   100	*   [x] Finalize `Containerfile` for production readiness (non-root user, proper volume mounts, etc.).
   101	
   102	## Code Review Completion
   103	
   104	*   [x] **PR #100 Review Comments Addressed:**
   105	  * [x] Fixed backend performance issue in `update_feed_url` function
   106	  * [x] Updated frontend API configuration for production
   107	  * [x] Fixed frontend error handling syntax and UX
   108	
   109	## Future Considerations
   110	
   111	*   [ ] Widget resizing/reordering (drag and drop).
   112	*   [ ] Import/Export OPML feed lists.
   113	*   [ ] Different widget view types (e.g., list vs. expanded).
   114	*   [ ] User authentication.
   115	*   [ ] Keyword filtering/highlighting within feeds.
   116	*   [ ] More advanced configuration options per feed.
   117	
Review the changes and make sure they are as expected. Edit the file again if necessary.

extras.old_content:
## Future Considerations

*   [ ] Widget resizing/reordering (drag and drop).
*   [ ] Import/Export OPML feed lists.
*   [ ] Different widget view types (e.g., list vs. expanded).
*   [ ] User authentication.
*   [ ] Keyword filtering/highlighting within feeds.
*   [ ] More advanced configuration options per feed.
extras.new_content:
## Code Review Completion

*   [x] **PR #100 Review Comments Addressed:**
  * [x] Fixed backend performance issue in `update_feed_url` function
  * [x] Updated frontend API configuration for production
  * [x] Fixed frontend error handling syntax and UX

## Future Considerations

*   [ ] Widget resizing/reordering (drag and drop).
*   [ ] Import/Export OPML feed lists.
*   [ ] Different widget view types (e.g., list vs. expanded).
*   [ ] User authentication.
*   [ ] Keyword filtering/highlighting within feeds.
*   [ ] More advanced configuration options per feed.
extras.diff:
--- /workspace/SheepVibes/TODO.md
+++ /workspace/SheepVibes/TODO.md
@@ -101,0 +102,7 @@
+## Code Review Completion
+
+*   [x] **PR #100 Review Comments Addressed:**

+  * [x] Updated frontend API configuration for production
